<title level="1" right="Hazard 13" pfs="">[Planar Rift](/Hazards.aspx?ID=476)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A rift attempts to draw creatures into another plane (the GM chooses the specific plane).

---

**Stealth**
DC 35 (trained)

**Disable**
DC 33 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) (master) to assemble a rift seal using objects strongly grounded to your plane, or [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1493) (7th rank; [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=2250) DC 31) to counteract the rift

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Into the Great Beyond** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=662), [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=710)) **Trigger** A creature moves within 10 feet of the rift; **Effect** The triggering creature and all creatures within 30 feet of the rift are drawn into another plane. Each creature can attempt a DC 33 Reflex save to avoid this fate.
name: Planar Rift
